meanings.definition: Of or relating to a monogram
meanings.sent1: The artist created a monogrammatic design for the wedding invitation.
meanings.sent2: She received a monogrammatic gift with her initials engraved on it.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a monogrammatic clue that led to the suspect.
meanings.sent4: His monogrammatic style of painting was instantly recognizable.
meanings.sent5: The monogrammatic logo was elegantly embroidered on the shirt.

meanings.definition: Consisting of a single letter or set of letters
meanings.sent1: The monogrammatic stamp had only the letter 'M' on it.
meanings.sent2: The monogrammatic monogram on the cufflinks was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent4: Her monogrammatic signature was quick and efficient.
meanings.sent5: The monogrammatic tattoo on his wrist symbolized his name.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the use of monograms
meanings.sent1: The monogrammatic stationery set featured personalized letterheads.
meanings.sent2: The monogrammatic towels in the bathroom added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The monogrammatic luggage tags made it easy to identify their bags.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was filled with monogrammatic clothing items.
meanings.sent5: The monogrammatic labels on the jars helped organize the kitchen.
